dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Cotrainr Flutter
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
cotrainr_flutter
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
LaunchScreen
Main
CoTrainr needs access to your health data to track your fitness progress, steps, heart rate, and workouts.
CoTrainr needs permission to write health data like water intake and workouts to your Health app.
CoTrainr needs your location to find nearby fitness centers and trainers.
CoTrainr needs your location to track workouts and find nearby fitness centers.
CoTrainr needs your location to track workouts in the background.
CoTrainr needs camera access to take photos for meal tracking and progress photos.
CoTrainr needs access to your photos to select images for meal tracking and profile pictures.
CoTrainr needs permission to save photos to your library.
CoTrainr needs microphone access for video sessions and voice messages.
CoTrainr needs access to your contacts to help you connect with friends on the platform.
CoTrainr needs access to motion and fitness data to track your steps and activity.
